description.value: Character can use Psyniscience as a Free Action instead of a Half Action. Additionally, the character can passively detect psychic effects and entities as opposed to actively. Effectively, whenever they would be able to detect a warp signature, the GM may allow them to make a Psyniscience Skill Test to detect it, in the same way they might use Awareness.

system.benefit: Character can use Psyniscience as a Free Action instead of a Half Action. Additionally, the character can passively detect psychic effects and entities as opposed to actively. Effectively, whenever they would be able to detect a warp signature, the GM may allow them to make a Psyniscience Skill Test to detect it, in the same way they might use Awareness.
